question: Bring out the Incorrect statement:
option1: Guru Arjun Dev was put to death by Jahangir
option2: Aryabhatta was a contemporary of Chandra Gupta-II
option3: Asanga was originator of Buddhist Yogachara idealism
option4: Asiatic Society Of Calcutta was formed by Sir William Jones to take on Social reforms
answer: Asiatic Society Of Calcutta was formed by Sir William Jones to take on Social reforms
explanation: Asiatic Society Of Calcutta, was founded in 1784 by Sir William Jones to enquire into history, antiquities, arts, science and literature of Asia.
